segment.source: Find a spot packed with loot, with no animals or players around!
segment.target: Find a spot packed with loot, with no animals or players around!

segment.target: It’s not the strength of the body that counts, but the strength of the spirit.

segment.source: CRAFT AN AXE TO CHOP TREES.

segment.target: Press to select a tool and then use it to cut down a tree or mine ore

segment.target: PRESS TO UPGRADE BUILDING OR ITEM

segment.target: Press to Jump Over Obstacles or Destroy Them with a Tool

segment.target: TRY TO PLACE A FOUNDATION FOR YOUR FORTRESS.

segment.source: A basic building material gathered from trees. Essential for crafting and construction.
segment.target: A basic building material gathered from trees. Essential for crafting and construction.

segment.source: Commonly found resource, useful for crafting tools and building sturdy structures.
segment.target: Commonly found resource, useful for crafting tools and building sturdy structures.

segment.source: A tool for chopping wood. Essential for gathering and can be used as a weapon.
segment.target: A tool for chopping wood. Essential for gathering and can be used as a weapon.

segment.source: A ranged weapon used for hunting wildlife and defending against threats. Requires arrows to use.
segment.target: A ranged weapon used for hunting wildlife and defending against threats. Requires arrows to use.

segment.source: Ammunition for bows. Crafted from wood and stone, essential for hunting and combat.
segment.target: Ammunition for bows. Crafted from wood and stone, essential for hunting and combat.

segment.source: Fundamental source for cooking and smelting. Crucial for enduring survival in extreme conditions.
segment.target: Fundamental source for cooking and smelting. Crucial for enduring survival in extreme conditions.

segment.source: A place to rest and respawn.
segment.target: A place to rest and respawn.

segment.source: Tool used for mining resources like stone, sulfur and metal.
segment.target: Tool used for mining resources like stone, sulfur and metal.

segment.source: Refined metal for crafting and building, made by smelting ore.
segment.target: Refined metal for crafting and building, made by smelting ore.

segment.source: Basic food from hunting wildlife. Needs cooking for safe eating.
segment.target: Basic food from hunting wildlife. Needs cooking for safe eating.

segment.source: Handheld firearm, useful for self-defense and hunting. Requires bullets.
segment.target: Handheld firearm, useful for self-defense and hunting. Requires bullets.

segment.source: Explosive device used for enemy damage.
segment.target: Explosive device used for enemy damage.

segment.source: Decorative item crafted from leather. Charges health when placed in your home.

segment.source: Used for upgrading and repairing structures. Essential for base maintenance and upgrading the workbench.

segment.source: Storage unit for holding items. Crucial for organizing and protecting resources.
segment.target: Storage unit for holding items. Crucial for organizing and protecting resources.

segment.source: Automated trade unit. Can be used to buy and sell items with other players.
segment.target: Automated trade unit. Can be used to buy and sell items with other players.

segment.source: In-game currency for trading and purchasing items. Acquired through various means.
segment.target: In-game currency for trading and purchasing items. Acquired through various means.

segment.source: A raw metal resource, used in crafting and building. Requires smelting to purify.
segment.target: A raw metal resource, used in crafting and building. Requires smelting to purify.

segment.source: Cooked meat, safe to eat. Provides better nourishment than raw meat.
segment.target: Cooked meat, safe to eat. Provides better nourishment than raw meat.

segment.source: Basic workbench for crafting items. It helps prevent building decay and can be upgraded using a Hammer.
segment.target: Basic workbench for crafting items. It helps prevent building decay and can be upgraded using a Hammer.

segment.source: Resource for crafting gunpowder and explosives. Gathered from mining.
segment.target: Resource for crafting gunpowder and explosives. Gathered from mining.

segment.target: Refined sulfur, a key ingredient in making gunpowder. Obtained by processing sulfur.

segment.source: Farming tool used for planting and harvesting crops. Essential for sustainable food production.
segment.target: Farming tool used for planting and harvesting crops. Essential for sustainable food production.

segment.source: A plant resource. Used in crafting textiles and other items.
segment.target: A plant resource. Used in crafting textiles and other items.

segment.target: A crop used for making food items like bread. Grown from seeds.

segment.source:
The demo's more than a sneak peek. It's our way to tweak improve and ensuring everything from gameplay to performance is top-notch. Plus, we're continuously adding cool new items.
Your support means the world to us as we gear up for the big launch.
By adding our game to your wishlist, you're providing immense support.
segment.target:
The demo's more than a sneak peek. It's our way to tweak improve and ensuring everything from gameplay to performance is top-notch. Plus, we're continuously adding cool new items.
Your support means the world to us as we gear up for the big launch.
By adding our game to your wishlist, you're providing immense support.

segment.source: The Foundation forms the stable base of your house.
segment.target: The Foundation forms the stable base of your house.

segment.source: Walls are essential for enclosing and protecting your base.
segment.target: Walls are essential for enclosing and protecting your base.

segment.source: The ceiling completes the enclosure of your living space.
segment.target: The ceiling completes the enclosure of your living space.

segment.source: Doors grant access to and from rooms, providing security while allowing passage.
segment.target: Doors grant access to and from rooms, providing security while allowing passage.

segment.source: The roof ensuring your house is covered from above. Can be used as a ramp.
segment.target: The roof ensuring your house is covered from above. Can be used as a ramp.

segment.source: The Ladder allowing access to higher or lower levels easily.
segment.target: The Ladder allowing access to higher or lower levels easily.

segment.source: Blocks can be used for creating partitions within the house.
segment.target: Blocks can be used for creating partitions within the house.

segment.source: Poles are used for structural support, often for holding up other building parts like ceilings.
segment.target: Poles are used for structural support, often for holding up other building parts like ceilings.

segment.source: The wooden high wall provides enhanced security outside your base.
segment.target: The wooden high wall provides enhanced security outside your base.

segment.source: Fences mark boundaries and make your garden look nice.
segment.target: Fences mark boundaries and make your garden look nice.

segment.source: This game is still in development
segment.target: This game is still in development

segment.source:
Ruins to Fortress is an indie passion project, and the game is still in Early Access. Many things may change before the final release.
Certain game or platform features aren't available yet, and you will probably encounter bugs. Feel free to drop feedback on our Discord channel where we try to respond every day.
Thank you for understanding as we continue work on the game.
Simon and Markus,
Ruins to Fortress devs
segment.target:
Ruins to Fortress is an indie passion project, and the game is still in Early Access. Many things may change before the final release.
Certain game or platform features aren't available yet, and you will probably encounter bugs. Feel free to drop feedback on our Discord channel where we try to respond every day.
Thank you for understanding as we continue work on the game.
Simon and Markus,
Ruins to Fortress devs
